name: CountryFarmSounds
0:
”Alexa open country farm sounds”
”Alexa play country farm sounds”
”Alexa launch country farm sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country farm sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des: This 7-minute audio experience allows listeners to feel as if they are the farmer, rising early on a summer morning to do chores. You'll "walk" along as the various animals are fed, a tractor passes by, and a gentle summer thunderstorm rolls in. If you are able, listen with a surround-sound device, though this is optional. The national television show Market to Market at Iowa PBS created this for our viewers, especially those who work or once worked the land. But all will enjoy the relaxing natural and manmade sounds of a mid-twentieth-century farm. We would especially like this to help those who may, for various reasons, no longer be able to set foot on that farm they once loved, whether that's due to dementia, physical injury, limited abilities or a simple move to another place. Produced by Colleen Bradford Krantz.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
